Equipment, Systems & Security\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM assets, including equipment, funds, facilities, systems, passcodes, and intellectual property are for business use and are not to be wasted.  Take care to lock up, secure and limit access to EPAM equipment and systems in accordance with EPAM's global and local security requirements.  \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you think EPAM systems or passwords have been compromised or the attached devices lost or stolen, promptly inform your manager and EPAM's security team. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Some incidental use of EPAM's assets may be acceptable, if otherwise in compliance with EPAM's policies and procedures; but, there is no expectation of privacy for any information, personal or otherwise, transmitted, received or stored using EPAM assets.  EPAM retains the right to access, monitor and/or intercept any such information at any time either with or without your or any third party's knowledge, consent or approval and your express consent is deemed given by your use of EPAM assets.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"separatorBLock\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
